ModMetaData.name: Additional Dragonian Backstories
ModMetaData.author: Crymson Fluffsune
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds additional backstories to the Dragonian Race mod which enables your Dragonian's to do more in general or simply be eye candy for that delicious milk and wool.
Hotfix Version update 1.1.2.2! Chinese Translation provided by EndlingSky Now includes a manifest giving you version information and dependencies.
I'm learning I promise.
